metadata.title: Radiance and Sea Ice Parameters

creators.name: Space Administration (NASA), Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC)

metadata.description: The data base contains Nimbus 7 SMMR radiances and sea ice parameters gridded onto the SSM/I polar stereographic projections on alternate days from October 1978 to August 1987.  Radiances are from 8 of the 10 SMMR channels at both horizontal and vertical polarizations: 6.6, 10.7, 18.0, and 37.0 ghz.  Sea ice parameters include total and multiyear sea ice concentrations.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Create a data base which contains Nimbus 7 SMMR radiances and sea ice parameters gridded onto the SSM/I polar stereographic projections on alternate days from October 1978 to August 1987.
